div.p: Mount Pleasant Independent School District is an award-winning, fully accredited K-12 school district located in Titus County in Northeast Texas. Serving over 5400 students on eight campuses, the district has active Early Head Start, Head Start and Pre-K Programs.

div.h3: Renaissance myON Reader is a student-centered, personalized literacy environment that gives students access to more than 6,000 enhanced digital books. Titles are dynamically matched to each individual student’s interests, grade and Lexile reading level.
Please follow the instructions below to access Renaissance myON instead of going directly to the site as stated in the Parent Guide.
div.h4:
1. Navigate to our Classlink website – https://launchpad.classlink.com/mpisd
2. Enter your username and password
3. Once logged in, click on the myOn Icon and you will be authenticated to access it.

article.class: fusion-post-grid post-16962 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-latest-news

div.p: Dear Tigers, The Governor has closed all Texas schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. More information concerning the end of the year will be posted here in the coming days. There are [...]

div.p: MPISD Meal Service change starting this Thursday, April 9: From this point forward, there will no longer be meal service on Fridays. Instead, on Thursdays 11:00 am - 1:00 pm, students will pick up meals [...]
